newsitem.title: USA: Maxwell unit wins $30 mln design program.
newsitem.headline: Maxwell unit wins $30 mln design program.

text.p: Maxwell Technologies Inc said on Thursday its I-Bus subsidiary has been selected by a major original equipment manufacturer for its next generation of rack-mounted file-server enclosures.
Production is expected to begin in November 1997, and the program has an estimated value of $30 million over the next three years.
Kenneth Potashner, chairman and chief executive officer of Maxwell, said the deal will boost the company's already-growing sales and earnings base.
